items.name: Teleflora's Rosy Autumn Bouquet
items.description: Everything's coming up roses this fall! Celebrate the season with this whimsical, food-safe stoneware pitcher arranged with radiant roses in autumn's favorite hues.
items.arrangement: Peach roses, orange spray roses, orange carnations and white sinuata statice are arranged with dusty miller and variegated pittosporum. Delivered in a Charming Acorn Pitcher.

items.name: Arrive In Style
items.description: This beautiful bouquet will most certainly arrive in style! Ready for the runway, as it were. A delightful combination of light colors and lovely flowers, it's simply beautiful.
items.arrangement: Light pink roses, white asiatic lilies, alstroemeria, cushion spray chrysanthemums and statice are delivered in a stylish vase. Style to spare!

items.name: Teleflora's Daisies and Sunbeams
items.description: The song says, "The sun'll come out tomorrow," but why not today? Whatever the weather, this sunny bouquet of yellow, peach and white flowers will brighten any day instantly. Perfect for a birthday, thank you or just because.
items.arrangement: This sunny bouquet includes peach roses, yellow spray roses, yellow asiatic lilies, white daisy spray chrysanthemums and solidago accented with assorted greenery. Delivered in a glass gathering vase.

items.name: Teleflora's Golden Laughter Bouquet
items.description: Inspired by the sunny sound of children's laughter, this lighthearted bouquet of golden roses and fragrant white lilies is presented in a stunning aqua cube vase. What a stylish way to make someone smile!
items.arrangement: This cheerful bouquet features yellow roses, white asiatic lilies, white carnations, yellow button spray chrysanthemums, seeded eucalyptus, dusty miller and leatherleaf fern. Delivered in a glass cube.

items.name: Just Tickled Bouquet by Teleflora
items.description: Won't she be tickled? Sure to put a smile on her face, this happy bouquet greets her with hot pink carnations and crisp white daisies arranged in a stunning Silver Reflections vase.
items.arrangement: Beautiful hot pink carnations and miniature carnations, white daisy chrysanthemums and yellow button chrysanthemums are arranged with fresh huckleberry and oregonia. Delivered in a Silver Reflections vase.

vase.alt: Just Tickled Bouquet by Teleflora Vase

images.alt: Just Tickled Bouquet by Teleflora Bouquet
Just Tickled Bouquet by Teleflora Bouquet
Just Tickled Bouquet by Teleflora Bouquet

items.name: Teleflora's Blossoming Romance
items.description: Love is in the air. Or if it isn't, it will be when you surprise her with a gorgeous array of light pink spray roses, fragrant white lilies and other favorites in a sparkling glass vase. You know when she'll love it the most? When it's a total surprise.
items.arrangement: This lovely bouquet includes light pink spray roses, white asiatic lilies, lavender stock and lavender waxflower accented with assorted greenery. Delivered in a glass rose vase.

items.name: Teleflora's Vintage Vibes Bouquet
items.description: Soft and feminine, this vintage-inspired bouquet looks oh-so-perfect in a glistening pink glass vase with delicate diamond pattern.
items.arrangement: Pink roses, pink spray roses, white alstroemeria and miniature white carnations are arranged with dusty miller, huckleberry, pitta negra and pink waxflower. Delivered in a Vintage Elegance cylinder.

items.name: Teleflora's Modern Adoration Bouquet
items.description: Nothing says Valentine's Day like this timeless red rose bouquet and elegant European glass vase that will be a forever décor favorite.
items.arrangement: Red roses, white asiatic lilies, white alstroemeria, red carnations and miniature red carnations are arranged with white limonium, lemon leaf and huckleberry. Delivered in a Modern Devotion vase.

items.name: Hugs and Kisses Bouquet with Red Roses
items.description: Delight your love with this beautiful bouquet of bright white chrysanthemums, precious pink carnations, romantic red roses and more in a radiant red vase.
items.arrangement: The charming bouquet includes white daisy spray chrysanthemums, pink carnations, red miniature carnations and red roses accented with fresh greenery in a stylish red vase.

Hugs and Kisses Bouquet with Red Roses Bouquet

items.name: Dreams From the Heart Bouquet
items.description: A lovely bouquet to soothe and comfort, a variety of white and peach blossoms sends your hope and strength. Beautifully.
items.arrangement: Beautiful flowers such as white hydrangea, spray roses and stock, peach roses, eucalyptus and more fill a tall glass vase.

items.name: Be My Love Bouquet with Red Roses
items.description: The spirit of love and romance is beautifully captured in this enchanting bouquet. It's the perfect gift for anyone you love.
items.arrangement: Red roses and carnations are exquisitely arranged with white asiatic lilies and chrysanthemums in a ruby red glass vase. It's lovely.

items.name: Love's Divine Bouquet - Long Stemmed Roses
items.description: Love's divine, and roses are too. At almost two feet tall, this beautiful mix of red and white roses - accented with Queen Anne's Lace, and adorned with a bold red ribbon - is a timeless gift for your beloved.
items.arrangement: Red and white roses accented with Queen Anne's lace and more are delivered in a glass vase accented with a red satin ribbon.

images.alt: Love's Divine Bouquet - Long Stemmed Roses Bouquet
Love's Divine Bouquet - Long Stemmed Roses Bouquet
Love's Divine Bouquet - Long Stemmed Roses Bouquet
Love's Divine Bouquet - Long Stemmed Roses Bouquet

Love's Divine Bouquet - Long Stemmed Roses Bouquet

items.name: Joy Of Roses Bouquet
items.description: A joyful gesture of love and affection, this chic arrangement of one dozen pure white roses with fresh greens is a special surprise on any occasion.
items.arrangement: 12 white roses are arranged with leatherleaf fern, huckleberry and variegated pittosporum. Delivered in a clear vase.

items.name: Yours Truly Bouquet
items.description: Make your special someone feel truly loved by surprising them with this extraordinary bouquet! A dozen and a half red and white roses are artfully arranged in a classic vase with delicate greens.
items.arrangement: This bouquet includes red roses, white roses, white sinuata statice, parvifolia eucalyptus, and sword fern. Delivered in a clear romanesque vase.

items.name: Teleflora's Kiss of the Rose
items.description: True love. Sweet love. Beautiful love. Celebrate all flavors of love with this elegant arrangement of roses hand-delivered in a stunning silver Mercury Glass Vase.
items.arrangement: Six ravishing red roses mixed with gypsophila and greens are arranged in a Mercury Glass Antique vase. Send this kiss of bliss!

vase.alt: Teleflora's Kiss of the Rose Vase

images.alt: Teleflora's Kiss of the Rose Bouquet
Teleflora's Kiss of the Rose Bouquet
Teleflora's Kiss of the Rose Bouquet
Teleflora's Kiss of the Rose Bouquet
Teleflora's Kiss of the Rose Bouquet
Teleflora's Kiss of the Rose Bouquet

items.name: Always a Lady
items.description: A romantic gift like this one is always appreciated. An eye-catching display of roses and lilies is perfectly arranged in a feminine vase which makes a beautiful and lasting impression.
items.arrangement: Elegant white roses and sweet pink asiatic lilies are hand-arranged with greens. It's the perfect way to show you love her always and forever.

items.name: Teleflora's Recipe for Romance
items.description: You'd better be ready for romance when you send this stunning bouquet to someone special. Every detail including its extraordinarily beautiful vase is handled with care.
items.arrangement: Crème roses, white spray roses, gladioli, miniature white carnations, lisanthius and waxflower are delivered in an antique silver hurricane Mercury Glass Vase. This is one recipe that will be long remembered.

items.name: Cotton Candy
items.description: What a sweet way to celebrate the arrival of sugar and spice and everything nice! This pretty arrangement will delight any new mom or mom-to-be, that's for sure! Feminine flowers fill a charming ribbon-wrapped vase. It's a beautiful thing!
items.arrangement: Pretty pink roses, spray roses and miniature carnations, white button spray chrysanthemums, lavender limonium and green pittosporum fill a spring glass vase that's wrapped with a pink satin ribbon. It's confection perfection!

items.name: This Magic Moment
items.description: It will be a magic moment when this divine bowl of pastel roses is hand-delivered to someone special. Perfect for any occasion, the soft colors and variety of rose blossoms will soothe anyone's soul.
items.arrangement: Beautiful yellow roses, peach and white spray roses and greens are delivered in a clear glass bubble ball. The effect is magical.

items.name: Teleflora's Enchanted Cottage
items.description: This magical bouquet will be at home in a cottage, a condo, a studio or an estate. It's so pretty it will be appreciated by all those lucky enough to receive it. Enchant someone today!
items.arrangement: White roses and spray roses, lavender stock and waxflower, all perfectly arranged in a clear glass vase that's wrapped with purple ribbon.

items.name: Teleflora's Be Happy® Bouquet with Roses
items.description: There are probably a million reasons this is such a popular bouquet. Of course, there are probably just as many reasons to send this cheerful arrangement. Full of happy flowers, this ceramic happy face mug will bring smiles for years to come. Especially when filled with that first cup of morning coffee or cocoa!
items.arrangement: Yellow roses and daisy spray chrysanthemums along with white daisy spray chrysanthemums and oregonia are delivered in the one and only Be Happy® mug.

vase.alt: Teleflora's Be Happy® Bouquet with Roses Vase

items.name: Teleflora's Sweetest Sunrise Bouquet
items.description: Cool and contemporary yet also sweet and warm, this delightful bouquet of floral favorites in a silver cube vase makes an enchanting gift. She'll love this sunny gift - and you'll love the sunny price tag.
items.arrangement: The cheerful bouquet includes white hydrangea, yellow roses, crème roses and yellow alstroemeria accented with fresh greenery. Delivered in a contemporary glass cube with a mirrored silver finish.

images.alt: Teleflora's Sweetest Sunrise Bouquet Flower Arrangement

items.name: Blush Rush Bouquet
items.description: Luxe lilies in a beautifully blushing shade of pink are sure to make them smile, no matter the occasion!
items.arrangement: This pretty bouquet features hot pink spray roses, pink asiatic lilies, white alstroemeria, pink matsumoto asters, seeded eucalyptus, leatherleaf fern, dusty miller, and pitta negra. Delivered in a Serenity Vase.

items.name: Cupid's Creation with Red Roses by Teleflora
items.description: Classic beauty and romance to spare, thanks to the graceful lines of a Couture Vase filled with stunning roses - the iconic flower of love. Like the arrow released from Cupid's bow, this gorgeous bouquet will go straight to your lover's heart.
items.arrangement: Exquisite red and pink roses, white and light pink spray roses and greens are perfectly arranged in a lovely Couture Vase. This is an inspired way to celebrate your love.
